question: On what grounds you cannot claim compensation from the product manufacturer?

question: The most formal and best definition of marketing is

options.label: Option 1
options.text: An organizational function and a set of process for creating, communicating and delivering, value to customers and that benefit the organization.

options.label: Option 2
options.text: Improving the quality of life for consumers by selling them products and services.

options.label: Option 3
options.text: Marketing is all about Meeting needs profitability i.e. identifying & fulfilling consumer needs.

options.label: Option 4
options.text: Marketing is an organizational function includes the 4Ps i.e. product, place, price and promotion.

explanation: This definition of marketing is one of the most comprehensive definitions of Marketing. This definition covers 4Ps i.e. four important elements & aspects of marketing. Product (Creating), Promotion (Communicating), Place or Distribution mix (Delivering) and Price (Value & Benefits).
